Instance Method# removeAllAppearanceStreams()

macOS 10.5–10.12Deprecated

```
func removeAllAppearanceStreams()
```

Deprecated

Use [`removeValue(forAnnotationKey:)`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotation/removevalue(forannotationkey:)) instead, and pass [`appearanceDictionary`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationkey/appearancedictionary) for the argument.
